project_name: drand - the distributed randomness beacon project powering the League of Entropy and Filecoin Leader Election
description:
The drand team at Randamu has been actively stewarding the League of Entropy, maintaining the drand software that powers it, and provided high-availability HTTP endpoints for Filecoin SPs to get timely drand beacons from the League of Entropy, allowing smooth leader election for the Filecoin Consensus.

Between November 2024 and September 2025, the team ran 5 so-called "resharing ceremonies", ensuring a healthy set of nodes are able to participate in the permissioned network that is the League of Entropy, as well as on-boarded 3 new universities into the League of Entropy: [UPC](https://www.upc.edu/en/),  [HSLU](https://www.hslu.ch/en/) and [CUIT](https://english.cuit.edu.cn/).

Furthermore, the HTTP relays ran by the team have consistently delivered over 2.75B beacon requests per month. A great improvement the team has been able to make in the past year has been to significantly reduce the latency of beacon aggregation, from roughly ~700-900ms down to only 150-200ms! 

![latency change](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/df371e22-35a0-48ac-a438-0fde58b7ff6f)

This was feasible thanks to extensive profiling and tracing capabilities being implemented in the codebase, leading to great improvement in performances as can be seen on the above figure.
end_user: Filecoin SPs benefit from a timely leader election process powered by drand and the League of Entropy. Furthermore, Filecoin Smart Contract developers can rely on drand-powered VRF or timelock capabilities in their smart contracts.
top_five_dependents:
Filecoin implementation rely on our projects to various degree, all of them are getting randomness from us, but Lotus for instance also uses some of the libraries in Go we are maintaining. 
- Lotus
- Venus
- Forest

Other projects and ecosystems are also relying on us to do a variety of things, but mostly to get verifiable randomness:
- Anyrand
- DIA Oracles
- Proof of Play
filecoin_users_percentage_using_project: 100% of SPs rely on drand and a healty League of Entropy network for timely leader election to power Filecoin Consensus.
